TextLibrary.Text: Sunspear
Gather your things. We have a long journey ahead of us.
Gather your things. We have a long journey ahead of us.
Gather your things. We have a long journey ahead of us.
Gather your things. We have a long journey ahead of us.
Why? Where are we going now?
Why? Where are we going now?
Why? Where are we going now?
Why? Where are we going now?
We go in search of the Spine of Sartek. An Ogre Mage has it at the far southern end of Kor. He has made it into a banner.
We go in search of the Spine of Sartek. An Ogre Mage has it at the far southern end of Kor. He has made it into a banner.
We go in search of the Spine of Sartek. An Ogre Mage has it at the far southern end of Kor. He has made it into a banner.
We go in search of the Spine of Sartek. An Ogre Mage has it at the far southern end of Kor. He has made it into a banner.
An Ogre Mage? I have dealt with them before. This should be easy.
An Ogre Mage? I have dealt with them before. This should be easy.

An Ogre Mage? I have dealt with them before. This should be easy.
You should strive to know your opponent before you speak of victory. The banner this creature wields makes him a formidable enemy.
